name: Cult - Ometepe - Churchill
additionalNotes: Hailing from Nicaragua with hand rolled, premium Nicaraguan long-fillers and a Nicaraguan binder all dressed in an Ecuadorian Habano wrapper. These tobacco leaves were picked from the volcanic, highly fertile soils of Ometepe, Nicaragua. You'll be met with intense notes of leather, spice, earth, and cedar. Medium to full bodied.
